protein.specific_function: Involved in the degradation of prenylated proteins. Cleaves the thioether bond of prenyl-L-cysteines, such as farnesylcysteine and geranylgeranylcysteine.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on a sulfur group of donors
oxidoreductase activity, acting on a sulfur group of donors, oxygen as acceptor
cellular amino acid and derivative metabolic process
cellular amino acid derivative metabolic process
